name: blotpub
description: An endpoint that accepts Micropub requests, creates a simple Blot posts and saves them to a configured Dropbox folder.

AUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT.description: URL to verify Micropub token. Refer https://indieweb.org/token-endpoint

SITE_URL.description: URL for your site. Example: https://johndoe.example

DROPBOX_TOKEN.description: Dropbox access token to grant access to Dropbox folder. Example: 12345abcde67890fghij09876klmno54321pqrst

POST_PATH.description: Dropbox path where posts are to be stored

MICRO_POST_PATH.description: Dropbox path where micro posts are to be stored. Default to POST_PATH

PHOTO_PATH.description: Dropbox path where images are to be stored. Default to POST_PATH

PHOTO_RELATIVE_URI.description: Relative public URI to uploaded images (ignoring Site URL). Default to blank

SET_DATE.description: Flag to enable post creation date to be set explicitly in metadata

TZ.description: Overide default timezone for dates to the preferred one
